title: My Client Won't Patch
body:
Following methods I have tried:
1. Restarting Computer
2. Reinstalling the game
3. Turning off Firewall
4. Using Hextech Repair
5. Starting game in Administrator
6. Restarting my Router
7. Disconnecting/Reconnecting Connection
8. Allowed to go thorough the firewall accessiblity thingy

So you tell me...

replies.body: Whelp, you've definitely done your fair share of troubleshooting that's for sure. How about you hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and let our tech guys do some of the work while you take a back seat. They'll be able to dig much deeper than I can, so you'll be in good hands.
I have fine the exact same thing.It only tells me that'll it'll backup the old launcher and restart
same, did you find a way to fix it?
